text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
text.Response A: This garden-mounted weathervane is a great way to decorate your lawn or garden and at the same time be functional. The weathervane is made of 14 gauge steel and has an antique copper finish. It comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This is a garden mount only.
text.Response B: This beautiful garden mount weathervane from Weathervane Express features a flag design and is made of 14 gauge steel with an antique copper finish. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This garden mount weathervane comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. It is designed for outdoor installation only. Please note that this is a garden mount weathervane and does not include a roof mount.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

913.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only

Response A

This garden-mounted weathervane is a great way to decorate your lawn or garden and at the same time be functional. The weathervane is made of 14 gauge steel and has an antique copper finish. It comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This is a garden mount only.

Response B

This beautiful garden mount weathervane from Weathervane Express features a flag design and is made of 14 gauge steel with an antique copper finish. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This garden mount weathervane comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. It is designed for outdoor installation only. Please note that this is a garden mount weathervane and does not include a roof mount.
